content: Added a ton of new pots and did a small revamp of the site to make it easier for me to add more content.
Links to my main site were updated. No new Webgardens have been added.
The following Webgardens were added: aroundthefur, oodlecat, prophetesque, re-nata, skykristal, and slashdiv. The following broken Webgardens were removed: nuange and paintkiller.

The following Webgardens were added: applesayce, dogmeat, epic1, enter-the-sevenfold, orion-overdrive, and qrunchysnaq! The webgarden for daximus.site had to be removed due to it seemingly not existing anymore.
